title: What are some amazing new tech websites for tech-related blogging for beginners? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, if you’re a beginner I’d suggest you to make your own free blog! Or you can also wait before stepping into blogging and do a set of guest posting on other blogs or Quora spaces. That'll make you realize whether you’re really interested or not. Although I’ve been associated as a freelancer for many tech-related blogs, I’ve been very fascinated by it. There is a certain way you need to write to make it more appealing. So a little bit of research will help you in there. Then, you’re good to go with your own blog. However, engaging the audience without a marketing plan is tough. I’ll wish you good luck with that. I’ll attach some of my technical blog writings here. Do reach out and follow me for more doubts! I’ll be there to assist you. These are some excerpts from Tech-Wonders. Not only I loved the blog, but the content and topic choices are commendable! https://www.tech-wonders.com/2020/07/free-graphic-designing-software-for-beginners.htmlWhat Are Deepfakes and What Are Their Applications?Oh, and hey, I’m the founder of a lifestyle and narratives oriented blog called The Blogger Monks! I hope this helps!
